title: nimmatiyAi irundE
sahitya:
nimmatiyAi irundE ninnait-tudikkavaruL nigharillA mANikkamE enda nALumE


anupallavi

  emmata uNmaiyum sammatamAghiya EkamE shuddhAnma yOgamE unaik-kUDi


caraNam    guNDuNI nAi pinnE kulaikkAmal pirar kOpap-porAmaip-puyal alaikkAmal
aNDap-puLugarum avatArap-puLugarum aDimai sheidinnuyir kuDikkAmal ayyA
